issue.title: Problem building the docker solution images based on a local file system

content.raw: You should be able to use the COPY command in the Dockerfile to copy files locally to the image.  There is an example at the end of the subt/docker/subt\_team\_entry/Dockerfile where it copies the entry point from the local file system to the image.
content.html: You should be able to use the COPY command in the Dockerfile to copy files locally to the image. There is an example at the end of the subt/docker/subt_team_entry/Dockerfile where it copies the entry point from the local file system to the image.
